text: Diego "The Nightmare" Sanchez (born December 31, 1981 in Albuquerque, New Mexico) is a Mexican American mixed martial artist (MMA). He has a background in wrestling and Gaidojutsu, a system of submission wrestling developed by his longtime trainer Greg Jackson. Sanchez currently fights as a welterweight with the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC). Category:American mixed martial artists Category:Sportspeople from Albuquerque, New Mexico Category:1981 births Category:Living people
title: Diego Sanchez
